FuncDef:
The lldp mdn enable command enables MAC Address Discovery Neighbor (MDN) globally.
The undo lldp mdn enable command disables MDN globally. The lldp mdn enable command enables MAC Address Discovery Neighbor (MDN) globally. The undo lldp mdn enable command disables MDN globally. By default, the MDN function is disabled globally.
ExtraInfo: To ensure that the local device can discover and identify non-Huawei neighbors, run the ndp enable command to enable MDN on the local device. After the MDN function is enabled, the device can receive non-standard discovery protocol packets from neighbors and identify neighbors based on the source MAC addresses and port names in the packets.
